languages.text: "Возможно, я плохо изучил биографию ваших предшественников — в основном мой взгляд цеплялся за упоминания великих завоеваний и открытия новых миров, а не отметки о специфическом нраве вашей родословной".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, я плохо изучил биографию ваших предшественников — в основном мой взгляд цеплялся за упоминания великих завоеваний и открытия новых миров, а не отметки о специфическом нраве всех в вашей родословной".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, я плохо изучил биографию ваших предшественников — в основном мой взгляд цеплялся за упоминания великих завоеваний и открытия новых миров, а не отметки о специфическом нраве вашей родословной".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “或许是我对王朝创始人传记的了解还不够透彻吧。这个王朝之所以吸引了我的注意，是因为它的伟大征服与开拓新世界的相关记录，并不是王朝成员放荡不羁的绯闻。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."

traits.locale_text: “或许是我对王朝创始人传记的了解还不够透彻吧。这个王朝之所以吸引了我的注意，是因为它的伟大征服与开拓新世界的相关记录，并不是王朝成员放荡不羁的绯闻。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez mi estudio de las biografías de sus predecesores haya sido menos completo de lo que debería. Me llamaban más la atención las grandes conquistas y los descubrimientos de nuevos mundos que el idiosincrático temperamento de su linaje».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez mi estudio de las biografías de sus predecesores haya sido menos completo de lo que debería. Me llamaban más la atención las grandes conquistas y los descubrimientos de nuevos mundos que el idiosincrático temperamento de su linaje».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我の先任者たちの伝記研究は、あまり徹底していなかったのかもしれない。我が注目したのは、偉大な征服や新世界の発見についての記述であり、あなたの血統の特定の気質についての言及ではなかった」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."

traits.locale_text: 「我の先任者たちの伝記研究は、あまり徹底していなかったのかもしれない。我が注目したのは、偉大な征服や新世界の発見についての記述であり、あなたの血統の特定の気質についての言及ではなかった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas dû lire assez attentivement les biographies de vos prédécesseurs. Il faut dire que ce sont surtout les nombreuses conquêtes et découvertes de vos ancêtres qui ont retenu mon attention, pas le tempérament de votre lignée. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas dû lire assez attentivement les biographies de vos prédécesseurs. Il faut dire que ce sont surtout les nombreuses conquêtes et découvertes de vos ancêtres qui ont retenu mon attention, pas le tempérament de votre lignée. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht habe ich die Biografien Eurer Vorgänger nicht gründlich genug studiert – besonders sind mir dabei die großen Eroberungen und die Entdeckungen neuer Welten ins Auge gefallen – Hinweise auf ein bestimmtes Temperament in Eurer Blutlinie fand ich allerdings nicht."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habe ich die Biografien Eurer Vorgänger nicht gründlich genug studiert – besonders sind mir dabei die großen Eroberungen und die Entdeckungen neuer Welten ins Auge gefallen – Hinweise auf ein bestimmtes Temperament in Eurer Blutlinie fand ich allerdings nicht."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."

languages.text: "Belki de seleflerinin öz geçmişlerine dair araştırmam, yeterince kapsamlı değildi. Dikkatimi çeken; soyundaki belirli bir mizaca dair atıflar değil, büyük fetihler ve yeni dünyaların keşfine dair ifadeler oldu."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my study of your predecessors' biographies was less than thorough — what caught my attention was the mentions of great conquests and discoveries of new worlds, not references to the specific temperament of your bloodline."
